title: Sex and Death - Stories - Sarah Hall - Peter Hobbs [EN EPUB MOBI
description:
Sex and Death: Stories by Sarah Hall, Peter Hobbs (Editor)
English | 2016 | Short Stories | 1.4 MB


In this provocative and haunting collection of short stories edited by two masters of the form, a diverse group of contemporary writers probes the nature and connection between two of the most powerful, exhilarating, and terrifying forces that define and shape the human experience.
The drive for lifeâ€”for survival and reproductionâ€”and the drive for deathâ€”for violence and self-destructionâ€”are the two dominant, instinctive urges of human behavior. These conflicting compulsions, characterized by Freud as Eros and Thanatos, are also the central themes of great literature. In Sex and Death, some of todayâ€™s most compelling writers from around the globeâ€”Kevin Barry, Lynn Coady, Robert Drewe, Ceridwen Dovey, Damon Galgut, Petina Gappah, Sarah Hall, Peter Hobbs, Yiyun Li, Alexander MacLeod, Ben Marcus, Jon McGregor, Guadalupe Nettel, Courttia Newland, Taiye Selassie, Ali Smith, Wells Tower, Claire Vaye Watkins, Alan Warner, Clare Wigfallâ€”explore these challenging themes with honesty, psychological acuity, brutality, tenderness, and empathy, in stories that are disquieting, illuminating, funny, and utterly dazzling.
